Texts.Chs: 联盟的一个前哨最近遭到了一群阿基马里人的袭击。 我们需要有人传送到这个星球去^green;平息领头的^orange;阿基马里义贼团^white;。作为奖励，^green;你可以进入克里翁大使馆的射击场^white;。
Texts.Eng: A Union outpost was recently attacked by a pack of Akkimari. We need someone to beam down to the planet and ^green;put an end to the ^orange;Akkimari Justicar ^green;that leads the pack^white;. As a reward, ^green;you will earn yourself access to the Creon Embassy's shooting range^white;.

Texts.Chs: 干得漂亮，我收到了报告，义贼已经得到了平息。给你: 这张安全卡可以让你进入射击场。
Texts.Eng: Great work, I received a report that the Justicar has been taken care of. Here you go: this security card will give you access to the shooting range.

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;克里翁大使馆^reset;都^orange;穆曼^reset;处
与^orange;穆曼^reset;交谈以传送到^orange;联盟空间站^reset;
Texts.Eng: Talk to ^orange;Mumam^reset; to warp down to the ^orange;Union outpost^reset;
